name: NPR
text: The state House and Senate both approved legislation to remove the 126-year-old current flag and to form a commission to redesign it. https://t.co/s1y58Vj4uc

text:

name: NPR
text:
The VA's motto is from Lincoln's 2nd inaugural address: "...To care for him who shall have borne the battle and for his widow, and his orphan." 

In all of America's wars, it was never just "him" bearing the battle.

Some say the motto should reflect that. https://t.co/21T8o9Q5oZ

name: NPR
text:
"Policing is not a marketplace. You can't choose another police force to take care of you," Rep. Joaquin Castro says. 

"And too often, there has been systemic racism and brutality that both African American and Latino communities have had to deal with." https://t.co/Je8NOvQ2OZ

name: NPR
text:

text:
The number of confirmed coronavirus deaths surpassed half a million globally on Sunday.

And more than 10 million cases have been confirmed around the world ‚Äî though researchers say the real number is likely much higher.

text:

text:

text:

name: NPR
text:
In China, dozens of young labor organizers and student activists were rounded up ‚Äî and disappeared ‚Äî in 2018 and 2019.

Now, at least 15 have been released from detention, allegedly only after they agreed to abandon their activism.

name: NPR
text:

But that makes the voting process even more challenging for Native Americans ‚Äî partly due to a lack of street addresses on many reservations.

name: NPR
text:

name: NPR
text:
Former police officer Joseph James DeAngelo Jr. ‚Äî the suspected Golden State Killer ‚Äî has pleaded guilty to 13 counts of first-degree murder.
